job.title: Fully Remote Machine Learning Software Engineer - $180k+

job.description: Fully Remote AWS Machine Learning Software Engineer 180kbrbrThis organization is a platformbased company that uses machine learning to provide health systems with a single solution for automating revenue cycling operationsbrbrstronguThe Ideal Candidate Will Havebrustrongulli 45 years overall experience in Machine Learning or Data Engineeringlili Must have Python OR C development experiencelili Machine learning frameworks required TensorFlow preferredlili AWS experience preferredlili Natural Language Processing highly preferredbrliulThis company is RAPIDLY growing and never stopped growing during the pandemic They offer excellent benefits a competitive salary 401K and unlimited PTO They have a great career advancement structure and are looking for the best and brightest to join their excellent teambrbrPlease apply ASAP if you are interested in learning more about this opportunity and we can set up a time to speak today mepsteinjeffersonfrankcombrbrAWS  Software Engineer  Machine Learning  Python  C
